_sText:
ZM_Windship_beta3

=====================

Description:
 In a world of fantasy, there are flying ships in the sky. But it's seem that one of the passagers was infected by a zombie virus.

=====================

Author's Note:
 I'm kinda a fan of fantasy stories. So after watching Avatar the movie,reading some mangas about fantasy, and playing a little part of final fantasy, I got an idea of making this map. 

=====================

Special Thanks to:
 TopHATTwaffle - Waterfall Texture
 Maximaxou     - White Texture
 Mali15        - Manga Image
 mpa115        - Skybox Texture

====================

zm_Windship:

zm_windship_beta3:
+ Public release
+ new hideouts
+ Playable on a server
+ Reactor remaked
+ New name
- Gameplay still not tested

zm_Fantasy_airship_beta2:
+ Map Fully playable on a server, in multiplayer.
+ The ship re-textured
+ 3D Skybox with mini ilands
- Ship a bit to empty
- Limited Test

zm_Fantasy_airship_beta1:
+ Map playable
- Unplayable on multiplayer

================

NOTE:
 I'm realy needing someone to test the gameplay of this maps , so if you have test it don't forget to feedback :P
